weeklyTopNews.title: Four new coronavirus cases detected in Darwin's Howard Springs quarantine facility after passengers arrive from India
weeklyTopNews.summary: Four Australians arriving in Darwin from New Delhi have tested positive for COVID-19. The NT goverment have said that the individuals are well and that they will remain at the quarantine facility.

weeklyTopNews.title: 'A critical period': Virus alerts issued for six new Sydney venues, as authorities flag Christmas warning
weeklyTopNews.summary: NSW Health has issued health alerts for six establishments across Sydney after after they were visited by a confirmed case of COVID-19.

weeklyTopNews.title: Home visits in Melbourne allowed once again from tonight under eased coronavirus rules
weeklyTopNews.summary: Melbournians will be able to have 2 adult visitors over per day from 11:59pm today.

weeklyTopNews.title: Victorian businesses given green light to reopen within days as coronavirus cases plummet
weeklyTopNews.summary: A host of restrictions have been eased and Victorians will now be allowed to leave there homes for any reason as the state recorded 0 new cases overnight.

weeklyTopNews.title: Daniel Andrews delays easing of restrictions as coronavirus cluster in Melbourne's north grows
weeklyTopNews.summary: Victoria recorded seven new coronavirus cases overnight prompting the state goverment to delay the easing of restrictions.

weeklyTopNews.title: Daniel Andrews says Victorian easing of coronavirus restrictions in doubt as cluster worsens
weeklyTopNews.summary: Victoria recorded 7 new cases overnight, 6 were linked to known outbreak. The state government has asked all staff and students from two schools in North-East Melbourne to get tested for COVID-19.

weeklyTopNews.title: Police arrest demonstrators at Melbourne protest against Victoria's coronavirus lockdown restrictions
weeklyTopNews.summary: Hundreds of protestors in Melbourne assembled today to call for an end to the lockdown. State Premier Daniel Andrews has described the protests as selfish and unhelpful.
